welcomeMessage.greeting: Welcome! I'm Sai, your Real Estate AI Assistant.
welcomeMessage.intro: I help buyers find their perfect home and assist agents in closing more deals faster.
welcomeMessage.firstQuestion: Are you looking to buy a home, or are you an agent looking to streamline your business?

questions: I'm looking for a 3-bedroom home in Nashville under $500k
Show me homes with pools in Austin
What's available in Denver with mountain views?
How much home can I afford with my income?
What's the process to get prequalified?
Can you calculate my debt-to-income ratio?
What are the market trends in Dallas?
Is now a good time to buy?

services.name: Smart Property Search
services.description: AI-powered search that finds homes matching your exact needs before they hit major sites.

services.name: Instant Prequalification
services.description: Get prequalified in minutes with real-time lender integration.

services.name: Market Intelligence
services.description: Data-driven insights on pricing, trends, and investment opportunities.
